n_clusters.name: number of clusters
n_clusters.desc: controls the number of groups that the algorithm is trying to find

eps.name: epsilon
eps.desc: The maximum distance between two samples

min_samples.name: Minimum samples
min_samples.desc: The number of samples (or total weight) in a neighborhood for a point to be considered as a core point. This includes the point itself

n_components.name: number of components
n_components.desc: The algorithm selects the number of components such that the amount of variance that needs to be explained is greater than the percentage specified by n_components

percentage.name: Percentage
percentage.desc: The percentage of features to consider

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.desc: Features with a training-set variance lower than this threshold will be removed

n_clusters.name: Number of clusters
n_clusters.desc: The number of clusters to find

linkage.name: Linkage
linkage.desc: The linkage criterion determines which distance to use between sets of observation

affinity.name: Affinity
affinity.desc: Metric used to compute the linkage

n_components.name: number of components
n_components.desc: The algorithm selects the number of components such that the amount of variance that needs to be explained is greater than the percentage specified by n_components

n_components.name: Number of components
n_components.desc: The algorithm selects the number of components such that the amount of variance that needs to be explained is greater than the percentage specified by n_components

n_components.name: Number of components
n_components.desc: Number of dimensions in which to immerse the dissimilarities
